column1: : PhotoboothMgr background/foreground layout description file
: This file has a line entry for each background/foreground layout, by name and functionality.
:   The data is stored in comma delimited colums -
:   'Name','Action Set','Folder', giflayers, customlayers, fg, bk, mult, layer 1 bk, layer 2 bk,
:   layer 3 bk, layer 4 bk, 'ratio file folder'
: The following are the internal Visual Basic variables that receive this file data, with comments.
:  0 BkFgName(256) As String           ' name of the layout
:  1 BkFgSetName(256) As String        ' photoshop action set name that this bk/fg action is found in
:  2 BkFgFolder(256) As String         ' background top level folder name
:  3 BkFgGifLayers(256) As Integer     ' number of guest images required to build a gif (ex:4 layer animations)
:  4 BkFgCustLayers(256) As Integer    ' number of guest images required to build a print (ex:photo strips)
:  5 BkFgFGSelect(256) As Int16        ' uses foreground? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes, check box
:  6 BkFgBKSelect(256) As Int16        ' uses background? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes, check box
:  7 BkFgMultLayers(256) As Int16      ' enable multiple bk/fg selection? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes,check box
:  8 BkFgImage1Bk(256) As Int16        ' 1 must always have one layout
:  9 BkFgImage2Bk(256) As Int16        ' 2 if there is a 2nd layout, -1 = not used
:  A BkFgImage3Bk(256) As Int16        ' 3 if there is a 3rd layout, -1 = not used
:  B BkFgImage4Bk(256) As Int16        ' 4 if there is a 4th layout, -1 = not used
:  C BkFgAnimated(256) As Int16        ' Bk/Fg files are animation layers, 0=false, 1=true (use all four bk/fg files)
:  D BkFgRatio(256) as int16           ' Bitfield for ratios (print sizes) supported see below..
:  E BkFgGifDelay(256) as int16        ' Gif needs 1 second delay at end
:   In the BkFgRatio field, we specify which outputs are supported by a
:   bitfield. The bit fields are:
:  8 00000001 00000000 - vertical images supported
:  9 00000010 00000000 - vertical Print actions carry bk/fg #s 1-4 in the name
:  A 00000100 00000000 - vertical Print actions carry the ratio names
:  C 00010000 00000000 - horizontal images supported
:  D 00100000 00000000 - horizontal Print actions carry bk/fg #s 1-4 in the name
:  E 01000000 00000000 - horizontal Print actions carry the ratio names
100-WaterFall
101-Washing Machine
102-Andy Warhol
103-Movie Private Screening
104-Slides Private Screening
105-Youtube
